articles.title: Activists Arrested At Statue Of Liberty After Protesting Trump's Immigration Policies
articles.synopsis: Activists in two separate protests against the Trump administration's immigration policies were arrested at the Statue of Liberty on Wednesday â€” one group unfurling a banner calling for the abolition of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while in another act of defiance, a woman climbed the statue's base to protest immigrant family separations.

articles.title: Thai cave rescue: Boys and coach not yet well enough to attempt escape
articles.synopsis: A medical assessment of the 12 boys and their football coach stuck in a cave in Northern Thailand has concluded that it is too dangerous to try to move the group out Thursday, according to a member of the Thai Navy SEALs who is not authorized to speak to the media. The SEALs have also started to pump oxygen into the chamber.

articles.title: Scott Pruitt resigns as EPA chief, Trump announces
articles.synopsis: Scott Pruitt has resigned as head of the Environmental Protection Agency after a string of controversies involving his leadership, President Trump announced Thursday on Twitter.
